mailing-address.narrative: Christian Aid, 35-41 Lower Marsh, London SE1 7RL, United Kingdom

description.narrative:
Ongoing Ebola epidemics and crisis in West Africa - 2014 CA soft appeal launched 24 Oct 2014 - see attached email extract
DEC appeal due to be launched 30 Oct 2014
